alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 22 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following county, Columbia. * WHEN...Until 315 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 116 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bloomsburg, Berwick, Catawissa, Mifflinville, Lightstreet, Almedia, Fernville, Buckhorn, Rupert, Mainville, Eyers Grove, Espy, Lime Ridge, Briar Creek, Orangeville and Bloomsburg University. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
